title: Superb
text: Great hotel. Great service. Requested quiet room as I was on a business trip and the staff were very good in sorting me out. The views from the rooftop are out of this world and would love to visit again sometime.

title: Brillliant Pizza
text: Brillliant Pizza. Right next to our hotel where we stayed in the Royal Olympic Hotel. Tasty food and quick service

title: Wow
text: Spectacular. Amazing views and so surreal. Never thought it would look as good as it did. Would highly recommend.

title: Great location
text: Great location and the airport terminal is one of the classiest I have ever visited. A well finished airport that I will be hoping to pass through again sometime. Lovely country and some of the nicest people in the world.

title: Will not return
text: I was starving after a long day of shopping around the beautiful city. First of all I was rushed into making an order which I didn’t appreciate. It felt as I was more of a nuisance rather than a customer. I went for the fish and chips and it tasted like the chips were cooked before and just thrown out to me to get rid of. Will not be returning.

title: Overhyped
text: Heard so much about this place so I said I had to try it out. When I got there, I was waiting for a seat even though there was free tables available. I got the eggs benedict and one egg was runny but the other one was hard boiled which really put me off. Overhyped for my liking.

title: Service is top
text: Stayed there for work and they were very accommodating. Baked cod tasted very fishy and also requested fish for breakfast but they said they couldn’t do it

title: Good value and selection
text: Set Menu €36 was good value. Nice selection to suit everyone and keep them happy. Usual chicken, steak and fish. Nice setting by the river. Looks very posh on the outside but they are very welcoming to everyone

title: VERY FRESH fish.
text: A fancy beach hut that is one hell of a treat. We were here on easter Sunday and I'm glad we booked. Delicious fresh fish in a very upbeat atmosphere. The only room for improvement would be the speed of service

title: Excellent service
text: Prawn & Crab Dumplings - Too much chilli and a little rubbery but very filling. Owner I think Susan provided excellent service.
